parameters.query:
SELECT 
  time_unix,
  date_str,
  hour_str,
  open_price,
  high_price,
  close_price,
  low_price,
  volume_from,
  volume_to
FROM {{$json.SNOWFLAKE_DATABASE}}.{{$json.SNOWFLAKE_SCHEMA}}.{{$json.SNOWFLAKE_TABLE}}
WHERE date_str >= DATEADD(day, -1, CURRENT_DATE())
ORDER BY time_unix DESC
LIMIT 24;

parameters.commitMessage: =Snowflake table daily backup for {{ $json.dateStr }} performed at {{ $json.backupTimestamp }}
